DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate of the long-term safety and efficacy of KCT-0809 in dry eye patients with Sjögren's syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study of KCT-0809 in Dry Eye Patients With Sjögren's Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Dry eye patients with Sjögren's syndrome finished KCT1301 study Patients with poor adherence to medication of study drug in KCT1301 study
